headline: Oh my: Biden job approval falls below 40% in RCP aggregate
author: Ed Morrissey
sentences: The last national poll tracked by RCP with a single-digit gap in Biden’s job approval came last week from the Economist/YouGov tracking poll (45/49).
Here’s a question for alert readers: when was the last RCP-tracked poll that put Joe Biden’s job-approval deficit in single digits?
Byron York noticed that Biden’s floor is now officially below 40%: That 15-point gap didn’t come out of nowhere.
If that was the good news, relatively speaking, the bad news is that the same tracking poll
Contemplate that for a moment before I answer it, especially in light of today’s numbers.
